text: Sylvia M Platt (born 1951), is a female former swimmer who competed for England. ==Swimming career== She represented England and won a silver medal in the 4 x 100 metres medley relay, at the 1970 British Commonwealth Games in Edinburgh, Scotland. Platt represented the Hyde Seal Swimming Club. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:English female swimmers Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in swimming Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for England Category:Swimmers at the 1970 British Commonwealth Games Category:Living people
title: Sylvia Platt
